data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
These will be a series of different types of chatterbots,
    CKS::Chaos will be one that learns like a human by matching patterns
    in messages, CKS::Koda will be an Eliza style chatterbot, CKS::Siko
    will be a chatterbot that learns new replies from its clients, and I
    plan to expand on these bots later.
